en.title: Version 1.5.7 (175)
en.text:
1.5.7 (175)

Bug Fixes and Improvements
- Weight conversion system
- Toggleable Modifiers now can use Speed as a formula
- Spells filters now show Full/Partial Matches
- Rework of Classes Primary Abilities
- Fixed some typos in some features bonuses
- Quick Spells reminders now work apart from Toggleable Effects from spells
- Fixed Spells effects that were not working to give advantage to skills
- Fixed Numbered Enemies losing its numbers when applying Conditions in the Tracker
- Adjusted Character Cards for small Screens
